scripts.setup: python -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel
scripts.install:linux: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y && export PATH="$PATH:/root/.cargo/bin" && python -m venv .venv || true && ( . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt )
scripts.dev:win: powershell -NoProfile -Command "python -m venv .venv; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate; pip install -r requirements.txt; uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
scripts.build:wheels: python -m pip wheel -r requirements.txt -w wheels || true
